document.text:
From:  
To: , "Weinstein. Marc A." 
.. 11 
Cc:  
Subject: RE: following up 
Date: Fri. 09 Apr 2021 14:29:28 +0000 
Marc and Andy, 
I'm writing to ask for one point of clarification regarding the estate's position regarding the assertion of attorney-client 
privilege. You previously conveyed to us that the estate asserted privilege with respect to devices the FBI seized from 
Jeffrey Epstein's residences in New York and the USVI in 2019. We accordingly assembled a firewall team to conduct a 
privilege review of the contents of those devices. 
The FBI is also in possession of a  computer that the Palm Beach Police Department seized from Epstein's residence in Palm 
Beach in 2005, which our office has not reviewed. Is the estate also asserting privilege with respect to devices such as this 
one that were seized in Florida in 2005? 
Thank you, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, March 31, 2021 1:59 PM 
To: Weinstein, Marc A. . 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: following up 
>; 
Thanks, talk to you then. We can use this conference line: 
From: Weinstein, Marc A. 
Sent: Wednesday, March 31, 2021 1:52 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: following up 
3:30 works for us. 
>; 
EFTA00029939

Marc A. Weinstein I Partner 
Chair, White Collar Defense 
Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP 
One Battery Park Plaza, 17th floor I New York I NY 10004-1482 
Office

To: Weinstein, Marc A.<

Subject: RE: following up 
CAUTION: This email was sent by someone outside of the Firm. 
Thanks very much— would it be possible to speak slightly later on Monday, perhaps at 3:30 or later? Alternatively, we're 
available between 10:30 and 2 p.m. on Monday. 
From: Weinstein, Marc A.
Sent: Wednesday, March 31, 2021 10:58 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: following up 
how about Monday at 2:30pm? 
Marc A. Weinstein I Partner

CAUTION: This email was sent by someone outside of the Firm. 
Marc and Andy, 
Hope you're both doing well. Are you available for a call early next week? We wanted to follow up with you on an aspect 
of our previous document requests. 
Thanks very much, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007
